causes: No infection detected. The plant appears to be in good condition.
remedy: Maintain proper watering, sunlight, and balanced fertilizer application.

causes: Caused by rust fungi that produce reddish or orange spores on leaves.
remedy: Remove infected leaves, apply sulfur or copper-based fungicides, and avoid overhead watering.

causes: Caused by powdery mildew fungi forming white, powdery spots on leaves and stems.
remedy: Ensure good air circulation, reduce humidity, and spray with neem oil or fungicides.
